engineering: Electrical engineers and physicists to construct a 600W AC power supply.

project_goal: Apply a large voltage across a vacuum chamber to accelerate and collide deuterium ions, fusing them to create tritium and helium, and releasing detectable neutrons.

project_leaders.name: Ethan Van Goor
project_leaders.desc: Ethan is a sophomore in Physics. His interest in nuclear fusion inspired him to help with the fusor project.
